title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value in the list box of report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value for the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Verify if the modified default value is retained in the list box.
